title: ICE: non-static region found when hashing a type

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: E-needs-test
labels.description: Call for participation: writing correctness tests

body:
``` rust
use std::any::Any;

fn foo(_x: &u8) {
}

fn main() {
    let _x = &foo as &Any;
}
```

```
error: internal compiler error: non-static region found when hashing a type
note: the compiler hit an unexpected failure path. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: http://doc.rust-lang.org/complement-bugreport.html
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace
```
